Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-48795 affecting package libssh2 for versions less than 1.9.0-4
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-48795 affecting package libssh2 for versions less than 1.9.0-4. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package libssh2 is earlier than 1.9.0-4, affected by CVE-2023-48795
